mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'YY-MM') PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT) PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_SUM FROM pd_order WHERE PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE >= #{startDate} AND PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE <= #{endDate} AND NOT PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE IS NULL GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'YY-MM') ORDER BY PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'dd') PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR, SUM(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT) PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_SUM FROM pd_order WHERE PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE >= #{startDate} AND PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE <= #{endDate} AND NOT PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE IS NULL GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE, 'dd') ORDER BY PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE_STR ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pd_order WHERE customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo}

SELECT PD_ORDER_TB_NO , CUSTOMER_TB_NO , PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE , PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT , PD_ORDER_TB_STATE , PD_ORDER_TB_ADDRESS , PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY , PD_ORDER_TB_RECEIVER , PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE , PD_ORDER_TB_PHONE , PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE , PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT FROM pd_order WHERE pd_order_tb_no = #{pdOrderTbNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, pd_order_tb_no , customer_tb_no , pd_order_tb_order_date , pd_order_tb_payment , pd_order_tb_state , pd_order_tb_address , pd_order_tb_ad_city , pd_order_tb_receiver , pd_order_tb_payment_date , pd_order_tb_phone , pd_order_tb_delivery_fee , pd_order_tb_used_point, pd_sale_tb_product_name, order_product_count FROM ( SELECT po.PD_ORDER_TB_NO , po.CUSTOMER_TB_NO , po.PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT , po.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_ADDRESS , po.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY , po.PD_ORDER_TB_RECEIVER , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PHONE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT, odn.pd_sale_tb_product_name, odc.order_product_count FROM pd_order po, (SELECT pd_sale_tb_product_name FROM pd_sale WHERE pd_sale_tb_no = (SELECT MIN(od.pd_sale_tb_no) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY od.orders_detail_tb_no DESC) FROM pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no)) odn, (SELECT po.pd_order_tb_no, COUNT(*) order_product_count FROM pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no AND po.customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo} GROUP BY po.pd_order_tb_no) odc WHERE customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo} AND po.pd_order_tb_no = odc.pd_order_tb_no ORDER BY pd_order_tb_no DESC)) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow} AND rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pd_order VALUES( #{pdOrderTbNo}, #{customerTbNo}, SYSDATE, #{pdOrderTbPayment}, 'W', #{pdOrderTbAddress}, #{pdOrderTbAdCity}, #{pdOrderTbReceiver}, NULL, #{pdOrderTbPhone}, 2500, #{pdOrderTbUsedPoint} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PD_ORDER SET PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE=SYSDATE, PD_ORDER_TB_STATE='P' WHERE PD_ORDER_TB_NO=#{pdOrderTbNo}
mapper.select: SELECT Y.*, C.CUSTOMER_TB_NAME FROM( SELECT X.*, S.PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME FROM( SELECT O.PD_ORDER_TB_NO, O.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT, O.PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE, O.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE, O.CUSTOMER_TB_NO, D.PD_SALE_TB_NO, D.ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT FROM PD_ORDER O JOIN ( SELECT PD_ORDER_TB_NO, MIN(PD_SALE_TB_NO) "PD_SALE_TB_NO", COUNT(*) "ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT" FROM ORDERS_DETAIL GROUP BY PD_ORDER_TB_NO) D ON O.PD_ORDER_TB_NO = D.PD_ORDER_TB_NO WHERE PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{dayFrom} AND #{dayTo}) X JOIN PD_SALE S ON X.PD_SALE_TB_NO = S.PD_SALE_TB_NO) Y JOIN CUSTOMER C ON Y.CUSTOMER_TB_NO = C.CUSTOMER_TB_NO
